algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming to calculate days to visit rooms, considering odd/even visits and modulo arithmetic.
problem_summary_simple: Find the first day when all rooms have been visited, following specific rules for room transitions.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DP to calculate the number of days to reach each room, considering state transitions based on visit parity and modulo arithmetic.
key_insights: The core idea is to track the number of days to reach each room.
The transition rule depends on the parity of visits to the current room.
Modulo arithmetic is crucial for handling the cyclic nature of room progression.
